title.english: Wandering Witch: The Journey of Elaina

description:
Inspired by her favorite book, Elaina ventures out to see the world she's read so much about. Like a leaf on the wind, she travels from one country to another, looking to sate her inquisitiveness and searching for new experiences. She's confronted by humanity in all its forms, whether strange, bizarre, or emotional. Exploration and curiosity drive her journey. Where to next, Elaina?

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: การเดินทางของคุณแม่มด

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Body Swapping
tags.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

node.description:
__[Official Website](http://choucho-net.com/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/choucho621/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choucho_)__ | __[NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/3416529) | [Instragram](https://www.instagram.com/choucho621/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGK8Fhw3qDEtHaivTsxfGgg)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5t7eQ2d1UmzfIr9oWQ538Y?autoplay=true)__

__Introduction:__
ChouCho is a Japanese singer-utaite known for doing vocal covers of Vocaloid songs on NicoNico Douga, in addition to making frequent appearances in anime with original songs.

__Biography:__
In 2007, she initially formed the band Lotus*Lotus (stylized as ロータス★ロータス) while still in high school, the band performed covers of songs from anime, then starting from June 2008 she first appeared on NicoNico with her cover of the song "[Black★Rock Shooter](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm3706654)" under stage name ちょうちょ. In 2011, she made her first major debut under record label Lantis, singing the opening theme song to the anime [Kamisama no Memochou](https://anilist.co/anime/10568/Kamisama-no-Memochou/), titled "[Kawaru Mirai](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Un9UiVL6Dms)", and later in the same year she reappeared with the opening theme song to the anime [Mashiroiro Symphony](https://anilist.co/anime/10397/Mashiroiro-Symphony-The-Color-of-Lovers), titled "[Authentic Symphony](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzGWaS0lyIo)", then in 2012, after releasing her 4th single titled "[Yasashisa no Riyuu](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hJiMN4Csjw)", she changed her stage name from ちょうちょ to ChouCho. The song was also used as the 1st opening theme song to the anime [Hyouka](https://anilist.co/anime/12189/Hyouka/), which released in 2012.

Her last upload to NicoNico was an album released with Comiket 81, titled "[Little Nostalgia](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16484379)", featuring 5 songs: Breeze, Beautiful World (Acoustic Ver.), Hana to Hoshi no Monogatari, North York and Under the Maple Tree.

[Website](http://www.lantis.jp/reinaueda) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ReinaUeda_Staff)

Reina Ueda is a Japanese voice actress and singer who is affiliated with 81 Produce. Beginning her career as a voice actress in 2012, her first main role was Naru Sekiya, the protagonist of the 2014 anime series Hanayamata. She is also known for her roles in video games such as Atelier Lydie & Suelle, Azur Lane, or Granblue Fantasy. She was one of the recipients of the Best New Actress Award in the 9th Seiyu Awards in 2015. She released a mini-album in 2016, and her first solo single in 2018.

**Non anime roles:**
- [Ganyu](https://anilist.co/character/233410/) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Faira - Neptunia Virtual Stars (VG)
- Lee Nabi - SoulWorker (VG)
- Honami Mochizuki - Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! (VG)
- Alisa - Soul Tide (VG)
- [Mio Hirahara](https://anilist.co/character/215834/) - Blue Reflection Tie (VG)
- [Veyle](https://anilist.co/character/313599/) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)
- Scarlet - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Sparkle](https://anilist.co/character/349492) - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Izumo - Azur Lane (VG)
- Pengy - Granblue Fantasy (VG)
- Rosa - Arknights (VG)
- Snow White - SINoAlice (VG)
- Mrs. Sweet Cake - No.1 Sentai Gozyuger (TV series)

[Website](http://www.i-am-ririko.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/riripero)

A Japanese guitarist, vocalist, lyricist, and composer.
